display_name: Average daily number of sleep bouts (continuous periods of sleep) between sleep onset and sleep offset in main sleep over all days from actigraphy
description:
sleep bouts are continuous blocks, one or more epochs in duration, with each epoch of each block scored as "sleep", between the start time and the end time of the given interval.

This variable is similar to variable sawa65; however, sawa25 is generated by Actiware software before data optimization.
